item.title: Informal Guidelines for R Coders [draft]
item.description: Editor setting Set 80 characters as the maximum length of the line in R Studio, and obey that limit. Set 2 spaces for code indendation. Naming convention Be consistent. Use lowercase verb with underscores _ for variable name: add_numbers(). You can group related functions from the same package using prefixes: math_add_numbers(). You can use CamelCase or camelCase naming convention if you inisist, but please, do not use periods inside function and variable names.

item.title: Checklist for R package submission to CRAN
item.description: Version: 1.2 The last update of this post: 2018-05-06. Below is a checklist that I wrote for my own purposes. I helps me to be sure that I did what I should have done before release a new version of R package to CRAN. Maybe it will also help others. See what new Hadley recommends: (http://r-pkgs.had.co.nz/release.html). Update R & packages: R all packages RStudio (stable or preview version). Update your package: Check unit tests.
